fields.text: Does your country have a specific law (or legal provisions that are part of a broader law) dedicated to climate change mitigation, which is/are created by legislation, statute or other form of domestic law?
Does this law include an economy-wide emissions reduction target that is currently in force?
Are there clear mechanisms for setting and amending targets, timelines or baselines?
Is there a duty to set emission targets?
Does your mitigation law contain any of the following:
Another form of commitment to quantitative emissions reduction, whether in force now or to take effect in the future?
Other forms of mitigation measures?
Does the law provide for a strategic plan on mitigation or  low GHG emission development strategy?
Does the law contain provisions for national carbon budgeting  or  measures for ratcheting up the target in the future?
Is this legislation legally enforceable?
Does your country have other legislation containing emissions reductions targets or carbon budgeting measures?
Does your country have a specific law (or provisions that are part of a broader law) relating to climate change adaptation?
Does it contain provisions for climate risk and vulnerability assessments?
Does it contain provisions for national strategies or plans for adaptation and climate resilient development?
Does it contain a duty on the government or mandate to develop national strategies/plans for adaptation and climate resilient development ?
Are there procedural requirements relating to its creation (such as the requirement to consult)?
Does your country have a specific law (or provisions that are part of a broader law) establishing or designating national bodies or entities with responsibility for climate change matters?
Does the law provide for the body or bodies to have coordination functions related to climate change matters?
Does the law provide for the body or bodies to have an inter-agency coordination role across government departments/bodies?
Does the law provide for the body or bodies to have planning and/or regulatory powers and functions  (ie powers to develop policies/plans and/or execute laws)?
Does the law provide for the body or bodies to have functions related to national greenhouse gas (GHG) inventory preparation processes and reporting?
Does the law provide for the body or bodies to have responsibility for administering climate budget/climate finance?
Does the law provide for the body or bodies to have a scientific or technical advisory role on climate change matters?
Are there provisions for consultation with various relevant stakeholders on climate change matters?
Are there provisions concerning delivery of education, information or capacity-building related to climate change matters?
Does your country have provisions of laws or regulations establishing provisions for trading in emission allowances or permits or abatement certificates  (emissions trading mechanisms)?
Does the law link the country’s emission trading mechanism to an international market mechanism?
Does your country have provisions of laws or regulations establishing a carbon tax or levies for climate policy purposes?
Does your country have provisions of laws or regulations establishing incentives for voluntary emissions abatement actions?
Does your country have provisions of laws or regulations establishing fiscal incentives for mitigation of climate change (reduction or abatement of emissions?)
Does your country have provisions of laws or regulations designating or establishing a body responsible for administering climate budget/climate finance?
Does your country have legislation establishing a national climate fund?
Do provisions of laws or regulations specify sources of finance for climate change and/or how the funds will be raised?
Are there provisions for access to international finance?
Is procurement of any public goods and services regulated to promote climate change policy?
Are there regulation of financial markets (e.g. debt and equity markets)  for climate-related risks and investment (e.g. regulation of Green Bonds, disclosure requirements for listed companies)?
Does your country have provisions of laws or regulations requiring domestic reporting of greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions by the government?
Does the law designate an agency to prepare a national inventory and report on national emissions data?
Does your country have provisions of laws or regulations requiring reporting of greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions by companies, industrial installations or financial institutions?
Does your country have provisions of laws or regulations establishing a scheme for the verification of information reported (public or private entities)?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) imposing obligations on government to set targets or create plans/strategies relating to the overall energy system?
Does this include provisions requiring an integrated energy plan?
Does this include provisions requiring an estimation of future energy demand?
Does this include energy access provisions?
Does this include provisions requiring a diversification or mix of energy supply?
Does this include electricity interconnection provisions?
Does this include provisions requiring market parity between different sources of energy?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) establishing governance bodies for the energy system or regulating how it is governed?
Does this include provisions establishing a body responsible for co-ordination between the different energy sectors/sources?
Does this include provisions establishing an energy system advisory body?
Does this include provisions establishing an energy distribution/grid management body?
Does this include provisions establishing an energy regulator?
Does this include provisions requiring consultation of various stakeholders in governing the energy system?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) related to carbon transition planning?
Does this include provisions establishing targets for decarbonisation?
Are there specific targets for Electricity?
Are there specific targets for Heating and cooling?
Are there specific targets for Transport?
Are there specific targets for Industry?
Does this include provisions requiring the phase-out of high carbon sources?
Does this include just transition provisions?
Are there specific provisions for Electricity?
Are there specific provisions for Heating and cooling?
Are there specific provisions for Transport?
Are there specific provisions for Industry?
Does this include provisions aimed at the reduction of energy demand?
Are there specific provisions for Electricity?
Are there specific provisions for Heating and cooling?
Are there specific provisions for Transport?
Are there specific provisions for Industry?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) imposing obligations on government to set targets or create plans/strategies relating to the production of renewable energy?
Does this include provisions establishing targets for renewable energy production?
Does this include provisions requiring a strategy/plan for renewable energy production?
Does this include provisions prescribing the levels of production from different renewable energy sources?
Does this include provisions establishing a goal/obligation to promote renewable energy?
Does this include provisions establishing a goal/obligation to review and report on renewable energy?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) establishing governance bodies for the renewable energy production or regulating how it is governed?
Does this include provisions establishing a renewable energy co-ordination body?
Does this include provisions establishing a renewable energy advisory body?
Does this include provisions establishing a renewable energy regulatory body?
Does this include provisions establishing a rural electrification body?
Does this include Provisions requiring consultation of various stakeholders in governing renewable energy production?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) regulating, or creating obligations relating to, renewable energy production and consumption?
Does this include provisions establishing renewable energy obligations for energy users?
Does this include provisions establishing duties of renewable energy providers?
Does this include licensing provisions?
Does this include provisions establishing (general or operating) codes and standards for renewable energy?
Does this include provisions establishing (planning or environmental impact) codes and standards for renewable energy?
Does this include provisions creating tradeable instruments that certify electricity has been generated from renewable energy?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) regulating the distribution and storage of renewable energy (as electricity or other forms of storable renewable energy)?
Does this include provisions for the specification of grid standards?
Does this include provisions for grid management?
Does this include provisions for grid access and integration?
Does this include provisions relating to mini-grids?
Does this include provisions for distributed/off-grid/micro generation?
Does this include provisions for the storage of electricity?
Does this include provisions for load shifting and/or demand response management?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) establishing incentives or disincentives that promote or obstruct the production of renewable energy?
Does this include fiscal incentives for renewable energy in the form of grants, subsidies or compensation?
Does this include fiscal incentives for renewable energy in the form of loans or debt support?
Does this include fiscal incentives for fossil fuels?
Does this include feed-in tariffs for renewable energy?
Does this include provisions for the regulation of power purchase agreements?
Does this include provisions creating incentives for micro/self-use energy production?
Does this include provisions for taxation of renewable energy production?
Does this include provisions for taxation of fossil fuel production?
Does this include provisions establishing financial support for research and development into renewable energy and/or its production?
Does this include provisions creating energy auctions or another pricing mechanism for energy?
Does this include provisions creating concessions for the production of renewable energy?
Does this include provisions regulating tendering for the production of renewable energy?
Does this include provisions regulating mining activities?
Does this include provisions regulating waste management?
Does this include provisions regulating decommissioning for energy production infrastructure?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) relating to budgeting and financing for energy infrastructure?
Does this include overall budget/finance provisions for energy infrastructure?
Does this include provisions for renewable energy infrastructure finance?
Does this include provisions for fossil fuel energy infrastructure finance?
Does this include provisions regulating the return or remuneration from investments in energy infrastructure?
Does this include provisions regulating guarantees and/or risk sharing in investments in energy infrastructure?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) relating to areas of energy that are unique or distinctive in how they are regulated?
Does this include regulations for nuclear energy?
Does this include regulations for biofuels and waste?
Does this include regulations for hydrogen fuel cells?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) imposing obligations on government to set targets or create plans/strategies relating to energy efficiency?
Does this include provisions establishing energy efficiency targets?
Does this include provisions requiring strategies or plans for energy efficiency?
Does this include provisions establishing principles for energy efficiency?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) establishing governance bodies for energy efficiency or regulating how it is governed?
Does this include provisions establishing an energy efficiency co-ordination body?
Does this include provisions establishing an energy efficiency advisory body?
Does this include provisions establishing an energy efficiency regulatory body?
Does this include provisions requiring consultation of various stakeholders in governing energy efficiency?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) regulating, or creating obligations relating to energy efficiency?
Does this include provisions creating energy efficiency obligations?
Does this include obligations for large consumers?
Does this include obligations for the public sector?
Does this include obligations for utilities?
Does this include provisions creating energy efficiency codes and standards?
Does this include codes and standards for buildings?
Does this include codes and standards for products?
Does this include sectoral codes and standards?
Does this include codes and standards for vehicles and emissions?
Does this include provisions regulating information labelling and energy efficiency ratings?
Does this include provisions establishing energy efficiency/performance certificates?
Does this include provisions requiring energy efficiency audits?
Does this include provisions establishing energy efficiency market schemes?
Does this include energy efficiency procurement requirements?
Are there sectoral requirements for electricity?
Are there sectoral requirements for heating and cooling?
Are there sectoral requirements for transport?
Are there sectoral requirements for industry?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) establishing incentives or disincentives that promote or obstruct energy efficiency?
Does this include fiscal incentives for energy efficiency in the form of grants, subsidies or compensation?
Does this include fiscal incentives for energy efficiency in the form of loans or debt support?
Does this include fiscal incentives for energy efficiency in the form of tax relief or rebates?
Does this include provisions creating concessions for energy efficiency?
Does this include provisions establishing financial support for research and development into energy efficiency and/or its consumption?
Does this include provisions for energy consumption taxation?
Does this include provisions for energy use charges?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) relating to budgeting and financing for energy efficiency?
Does this include provisions for overall budgeting/financing of energy efficiency?
Does this include provisions for budgeting/financing of energy efficiency projects?
Does this include provisions regulating the return or remuneration of investments into energy efficiency schemes?
Does this include provisions regulating guarantees and risk sharing in investments into energy efficiency schemes?
Does this include provisions for energy performance contracting?
Does this include investment provisions for public/private partnerships?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) relating to the design and regulation of energy markets?
Does this include provisions establishing overall market principles?
Does this include provisions relating to market access?
Does this include provisions establishing an energy market board?
Does this include provisions on market transparency?
Does this include provisions on market integrity and market abuse?
Does this include market regulatory coordination provisions?
Does this include market design rules for promoting efficiency?
Does your country have legislation (or other formal law) relating to trade and competition within energy markets?
Does this include provisions establishing import tariffs?
Does this include provisions establishing non-tariff measures?
Does this include provisions relating to state aid or subsidies?
Does this include competition provisions?
Does this include competition provisions on restrictive agreements/arrangements?
Does this include competition provisions on abuse of dominant position?
Does this include competition provisions on ownership unbundling?
Does this include competition provisions on dumping?
